Description.Name: Henry Ortega
Description.Details: Henry Ortega, callsign "Endgame", a well respected tactical mastermind with a turbulent past. Once a cunning and ruthless marauder, he eventually severed ties with his lawless origins when his daughter Brodie was born. Renowned for his strategic brilliance, he calculates every move on the battlefield, transforming each encounter into a decisive endgame.
